name: Little Guppy Shark
text: If you control no monsters: You can Special Summon this card (from your hand) and 1 "Shark" monster from your Deck. You can only activate this effect of "Little Guppy Shark" once per turn. You cannot Summon monsters the turn you activate this effect except WATER monsters. If this card is used for the Xyz Summon of a WATER monster, it can be treated as a Level 3, 4, or 5 monster.
